pageContext.claim: “It is amazing that I can be at 51% with Zogby when the Fake & Corrupt News is almost 100% against me. Great job Mr. President!”
pageContext.analysis: A Zogby poll conducted Aug. 9-12 did show approval for Trump at 51 percent, but it has a Republican bias. The polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight say an adjusted rating would show Trump with 49 percent support. Trump frequently cites individual polls that put him in the best light. On August 27, 538's blend of polls found Trump with only a 41.3 percent approval rating.
